post.body:
I need some help trying to replace the ultimates, plasma gun and rocket launcher with the doomxl's plasmagun and rocket launcher. Nothing happens when I combine the the 2 mods. OR it doom 3 crashes .Can anyone help?
(Im A NOOB as you can see by my username)
http://doom3.filefront.com/file/doomXL;31701
http://doom3.filefront.com/file/Ultimate_Mod;76555

post.author: rich_is_bored
post.body:
You can't mix and match mods all willy nilly. You have to understand the relationships between all the various assets and how they come together to make a plasma gun or rocket launcher.

This is not a simple matter of making sure you choose the correct files from one mod and swap them with those from another. Some file types like DEF, MTR, etc, can contain multiple declarations. You have to read through these files and determine what parts you'll need and what you don't.

I suggest you start here...

http://www.modwiki.net/wiki/Declarations

The plasma gun and rocket launcher are both entities. Everything you'll need to port assets from one mod to another ties into the entity declarations for those two weapons.
